LanguageData.TenantCaptured: You've captured {PAWN_nameDef}!\n\n Watch out as you might earn the ire of {PAWN_nameDef}'s friends and relatives.
LanguageData.TenantCapturedRetribution: Hello, My name is {PAWN_nameDef}, you disrespected my {0}. Prepare to die.
LanguageData.TenantDeath: {PAWN_nameDef} died!\n\nYou've failed your duties as a host. Watch out as you might earn the ire of {PAWN_nameDef}'s friends and relatives.
LanguageData.TenantDeathRetribution: Hello, My name is {PAWN_nameDef}, you killed my {0}. Prepare to die.
